.. dropdown:: **splitPolars**
    
    Extract the 4 interferograms corresponding to the 4 polarizations of a polarized camera

    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Synthax</p>
    
    .. code-block:: matlab

        [obj00,obj45,obj90,obj135]=splitPolars(obj)

    .. raw:: html
      
        <p class="title">Description</p>

    This method creates 4 *Interfero* objects ``obj00``, ``obj45``, ``obj90`` and ``obj135``, corresponding respectively to the 0, 45, 90 and 135Â° polarizations of a polarized camera.
